meta[language=en]: The ID number must match your file name.
Make sure there is no extra line at the end of the files.

column1: 0000000000|||What you’re seeing here is a recorded lip sync animation running in Unity. This plugin doesn’t use any video files or webcam
0000000001|||This is done purely by inputting the recorded audio file into a program, and then passing the result through a plugin that makes a Unity animation file for the mouth movement
0000000002|||Peter Piper picked a peck of pickled peppers. How much wood would a woodchuck chuck if a woodchuck could chuck wood
0000000003|||The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. Sally sells seashells down by the seashore.
